dashboard.title: Anchorr Configuration
dashboard.subtitle: Anchorr needs to be connect with your Discord bot and with your Jellyfin and Jellyseerr instances.
dashboard.subtitle_detail: Below is a step-by-step walkthrough to help you set up everything you need to get started!

config.title: Configuration
config.language_help: Select your preferred language for the interface.
config.discord_instructions_intro: First, you need to create a Discord application for the bot. Access Discord Developer Portal and log in. Create a new application, then:
config.discord_instructions_1: Go to "Bot" in the sidebar and click "Add Bot"
config.discord_instructions_2: In the "Bot" section, scroll down to "Privileged Gateway Intents" and enable SERVER MEMBERS INTENT (required for user mappings feature)
config.discord_instructions_6: Copy the generated URL, open it in your browser, and authorize the bot on your Discord server
config.discord_instructions_7: Come back here and fill in the Discord Bot Token and Bot Client ID below, then select your server and notification channel from the dropdowns
config.discord_token_help: The secret token of your bot from the Discord Developer Portal ‚Üí Bot ‚Üí Reset Token
config.bot_id_help: The application's client ID from the Discord Developer Portal ‚Üí OAuth2 ‚Üí Client ID
config.auto_start_info: Auto-Start: The bot will automatically start when you enter and save Discord credentials for the first time.
config.discord_server_help: Select the Discord server where the bot will operate. Make sure you've added the bot to your server first.
config.default_channel_help: Select the default Discord channel for Jellyfin notifications. You can override this per-library in Step 4. Choose a server above first.
config.jellyseerr_url_help: The full URL of your Jellyseerr instance.
config.jellyseerr_api_key_help: Your API key from Jellyseerr settings
config.tmdb_api_key_help: A TMDB API Key is required for searching and fetching movie/show details. Found in the API settings page of your TMDB account after you log in.
config.omdb_api_key_help: Optional, but recommended for richer data like ratings and directors. Create one on the API Key page of OMDb.
config.jellyfin_url_help: The public URL of your Jellyfin server. Used for the "Watch Now" button.
config.jellyfin_api_key_help: API key for your Jellyfin server. Generate one in Jellyfin Dashboard ‚Üí Administration ‚Üí API Keys. Required for loading libraries and enhanced features.
config.test_endpoint_help: Testing the endpoint successfully will automatically populate the Jellyfin Server ID field.
config.jellyfin_server_id_help: Used for redirecting to the correct path of your Jellyfin server media page when using the "Watch Now" button. You can find this in your Jellyfin URL when viewing the page of any movie or show from your library.
